price: Baranakubaza (yewe Muhamadi) ku witwa Dhul Qar’nayini.[1] Vuga uti “Ndagira icyo mubabwiraho.”
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا
footnotes: [1] Dhul Qar’nayini: Ni izina ry’umuntu wavuzwe muri Qur’an, wari umwami w’umunyakuri akaba ari we wubatse urukuta rurinda abantu kugerwaho n’ibikorwa by’inkozi z’ibibi zitwa Yaajuja na Maajuja.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
